reviewText: This DVD increases children's understanding of their emotions. It also teaches positive ways to deal with sadness, loneliness, fear, anger, etc.  Quotes:  Parent, I like everything about the DVDs. Megan talks about what she has learned from Kelly Bear all the time. She seems to understand herself better.  Teacher, My students remember how Kelly Bear felt in different situations. They have learned positive ways to deal with their negative emotions.  My children love Kelly Bear.  Child, Before, when I saw other people get hurt, I just went on and didn't help because they weren't my friends. NOW, I help.
